dcterms:description: The Gibson dataset is a real-world indoor scene dataset used for embodied AI research, providing a variety of environments for navigation tasks.
dcterms:title: Gibson Dataset

dcterms:description: The Habitat Simulation Platform is a 3D simulation environment designed for embodied AI research, allowing for the testing and training of navigation algorithms.
dcterms:title: Habitat Simulation Platform

dcterms:description: The VO dataset is constructed from the Gibson dataset and is used for training visual odometry models in navigation tasks.
dcterms:title: VO Dataset
